  • function fizzBuzz (n) {
  • const answer = []
  • for (let i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
  • if (i % 3 == 0 && i % 5 == 0)
  • answer.push("FizzBuzz")
  • else if (i % 3 == 0)
  • answer.push("Fizz")
  • else if (i % 5 == 0)
  • answer.push("Buzz")
  • else
  • answer.push(i.toString())
  • }
  • return answer
  • };
  • console.log(fizzBuzz(14))
